title: Review: PedalCell dynamo outpowers hub systems, works on any bike
content:
The PedalCell dynamo attaches to your fork and rolls against your rim to create electricity, turning out enough juice to charge your phone and power lights far longer than a typical hub dynamo. We put it to the test to see how well it could top things off, and rode alongside a friend with a [â€¦]

The post Review: PedalCell dynamo outpowers hub systems, works on any bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Staff
